name: 3D Dogfighting Demo
description:
Long-awaited sequel to the AGDG Demo Day 7 smash hit 2D Dogfighting Demo.

Supports controllers and KB+M, but a controller is recommended.

Known issues:

  • No sound
  • Missiles one-shot the player (how about you try dodging them)
  • You can't crash
  • Sometimes a bunch of the screen will be covered in gray. Something to do with the trail rendering on some GPUs, only happens sometimes on one of my machines. Let me know if it happens to you / how often. Restarting the game usually fixes it for me

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/KirkWoodes
